lines.text: You won't like it at first, but when you get used to it, you'll really hate it.
She's suffering from a guilt complex that's close to madness.
Remember, be quiet. One yell out of a slaphappy dame will blow the whole works. Now, go on, beat it.
Yeah, stripteaser. But I always wanted to do impersonations. I wanted to take off people, not my clothes, and thats why I am doing a stretch from ten to life.
Ten to life for just taking off your clothes?
